description: Granicus fl. (modern Biga Çayı) is a river in Asia Minor that flows from Mount Ida to the Sea of Marmara.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Biga Çayı. Alexander fought the famous battle of the Granicus river against the Persian Empire in May 334 BC.
